oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and single crystal X-ray structures of N,N '-bis(diphenylphosphinothioyl)piperzine and bis(diphenylphosphinoselenoyl)piperzine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
GEORGE, PP
MAGUE, JT
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: transition-metal chemistry
coordination chemistry
molecular-structures
complexes
ligands
derivatives
palladium(ii)
phosphines
catalysts
insertion
bis( phosphines)
diselenide
disulfide
piperzine derivative
x-ray structure
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reaction of N, N'-bis(diphenylphosphino) piperzine with elemental sulfur or selenium in toluene under refluxing conditions afforded Ph2P(S)N(C4H8)NP(S)Ph-2 or Ph2P(Se) N(C4H8)NP(Se)Ph-2 in a quantitative yield. The molecular structures were determined by X-ray studies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PHOSPHORUS SULFUR AND SILICON AND THE RELATED ELEMENTS, 181(1), 141-146
